Training: Encodings I
===
Hint: 7-bit ASCII

英文字母的ASCII只佔了七個bit，所以將binary分成七個一組，再轉換成ASCII就能拿到password了。
```python=
# 7-bit_binary_to_ascii.py
binarytext = ""
binary = ""
lis = []

count = 1
for i in binarytext:
	if ((count-1)%7==0):
		lis.append(binary)
		binary=""
	binary+=i
	count+=1
	
while '' in lis:
	lis.remove('')
# print(lis)

for i in lis:
	print(chr(int(i, 2)), end="")
```

```
$ python 7-bit_binary_to_ascii.py
This text is 7-bit encoded ascii. Your password is xxxxxxxxxxx
```
